def excludeIOU(cord1,cord2):
    x1 = cord1[0]
    y1 = cord1[1]
    x2 = x1+cord1[2]
    y2 = y1+cord1[3]
    
    a1 = cord2[0]
    b1 = cord2[1]
    a2 = a1+cord2[2]
    b2 = b1+cord2[3]
    
    if(not isOverlap):
        return cord1[2]*cord1[3] +cord2[2]*cord2[3]
    
    mx1 = max(x1,a1)
    my1 = max(y1,b1)
    mx2 = min(x2,a2)
    my2 = min(y2,b2)
    
    area = (mx2 - mx1) * (my2-my1)
    return cord1[2]*cord1[3] +cord2[2]*cord2[3] - 2*area
